text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea At a recent keynote, one of the smartest and most successful female devs I know had on a cute white blazer. She took it off for the keynote because "developers don't respect that".  My 1st thought was "she's right". My 2nd thought was "we must choose authenticity". Don't play...

author.name: Heather Stephens
author.description: @Java in Edu @Oracle. Was @Microsoft, BEA. #NeverStopLearning, #Montana ‚ù§, Water baby, #Auditrackday enthusiast. Tweets are mine. #DevRel #GoCatsGo #CoffeeFirst
